languages.text: Вам пришлось ожидать помощи еще несколько корабельных циклов, пока отряд сопровождения спускался с высших палуб до самого низа. Оповещенные о "{mf|высоком|высокой} {mf|госте|гостье}", смотрители отсека Тета-54 постарались скрасить ваше времяпрепровождение приемлемой едой, мягкой постелью и даже теплой водой, которая по уставу не положена местным. Наконец вы видите несколько смутно знакомых лиц — офицеров сопровождения.

traits.locale_text: Вам пришлось ожидать помощи еще несколько корабельных циклов, пока отряд сопровождения спускался с высших палуб до самого низа. Оповещенные о "{mf|высоком|высокой} {mf|госте|гостье}", смотрители отсека Тета-54 постарались скрасить ваше времяпрепровождение приемлемой едой, мягкой постелью и даже теплой водой, которая по уставу не положена местным. Наконец вы видите несколько смутно знакомых лиц — офицеров сопровождения.

languages.text: You had to wait several more ship cycles for the escort squad to make its way from the uppermost decks down to the very bottom. Informed about a "high-ranking guest" in their midst, the overseers of Bay Theta 54 tried to brighten your stay with passable food, a soft bed, and even warm water, a privilege not accorded to locals. Eventually, you see the familiar faces of escort officers who have come to retrieve you.
languages.original_text: Вам пришлось ожидать помощи еще несколько корабельных циклов, пока отряд сопровождения спускался с высших палуб до самого низа. Оповещенные о "{mf|высоком|высокой} {mf|госте|гостье}", смотрители отсека Тета-54 постарались скрасить ваше времяпрепровождение приемлемой едой, мягкой постелью и даже теплой водой, которая по уставу не положена местным. Наконец вы видите несколько смутно знакомых лиц — офицеров сопровождения.

traits.locale_text: You've had to wait for several more ship cycles as your escort squad was making its way down from the uppermost decks to the very bottom. Informed about a "high-ranking guest," the overseers of Theta 54 have tried to brighten your stay with passable food, a soft bed, and even warm water, a privilege the rules don't accord to the locals. All's well that ends well: you're at the helm again, continuing your journey through the Koronus Expanse. Long live {name} von Valancius!

You've had to wait for several more ship cycles as your escort squad was making its way down from the uppermost decks to the very bottom. Informed about a "high-ranking guest," the overseers of Theta 54 have tried to brighten your stay with passable food, a soft bed, and even warm water, a privilege the rules don't accord to the locals. All's well that ends well: you're at the helm again, continuing your journey through the Koronus Expanse. Long live {name} von Valancius!

You've had to wait several more ship cycles as your escort squad was making its way down from the uppermost decks to the very bottom. Informed about a "high-ranking guest," the overseers of Theta 54 have tried to brighten your stay with passable food, a soft bed, and even warm water, a privilege the rules don't accord to the locals. All's well that ends well: you're at the helm again, continuing your journey through the Koronus Expanse. Long live {name} von Valancius!

The Rogue Trader had to wait several more ship cycles for the escort squad to make its way from the uppermost decks down to the very bottom. Informed about a "high-ranking guest" in their midst, the overseers of Bay Theta 54 tried to brighten the Rogue Trader's stay with passable food, a soft bed, and even warm water, a privilege not accorded to locals. Eventually, the Lord Captain sees the familiar faces of escort officers who have come to retrieve {mf|him|her}.

The Rogue Trader had to wait several more ship cycles for the escort squad to make its way from the uppermost decks down to the very bottom. Informed about a "high-ranking guest" in their midst, the overseers of Bay Theta 54 tried to brighten the Rogue Trader's stay with passable food, a soft bed, and even warm water, a privilege not accorded to locals. All's well that ends well: the Lord Captain is at the helm again, continuing {mf|his|her} journey through the Koronus Expanse. Long live {name} von Valancius!

You had to wait several more ship cycles for the escort squad to make its way from the uppermost decks down to the very bottom. Informed about a "high-ranking guest" in their midst, the overseers of Bay Theta 54 tried to brighten your stay with passable food, a soft bed, and even warm water, a privilege not accorded to locals. Eventually, you see the familiar faces of escort officers who have come to retrieve you.

languages.text: 你不得不再等上几个飞船周期，等待护卫队从最上层甲板抵达最下层。西塔54区的管事意识到这里有一位“重要客人”之后，立刻提供了合格的食物、柔软的床铺，甚至还提供了温水，让你尽量住得舒服一些，这些都是下层船员无法享受到的特权。到了最后，你终于见到了军官熟悉的面孔，准备回到舰长室了。
languages.original_text: You had to wait several more ship cycles for the escort squad to make its way from the uppermost decks down to the very bottom. Informed about a "high-ranking guest" in their midst, the overseers of Bay Theta 54 tried to brighten your stay with passable food, a soft bed, and even warm water, a privilege not accorded to locals. Eventually, you see the familiar faces of escort officers who have come to retrieve you.

traits.locale_text: 你不得不再等上几个飞船周期，等待护卫队从最上层甲板抵达最下层。西塔54区的管事意识到这里有一位“重要客人”之后，立刻提供了合格的食物、柔软的床铺，甚至还提供了温水，让你尽量住得舒服一些，这些都是下层船员无法享受到的特权。到了最后，你终于见到了军官熟悉的面孔，准备回到舰长室了。

languages.text: Tuviste que esperar varios ciclos de la nave más hasta que el escuadrón de escolta llegó de las cubiertas superiores a las más profundas. Los supervisores de la bahía Theta 54, informados de la presencia de un{mf||a} «invitad{mf|o|a} de alto rango», intentaron alegrar tu visita con comida decente, una cama agradable e incluso agua caliente, un privilegio ajeno a los residentes. Por fin, ves caras conocidas entre los oficiales enviados a traerte de vuelta.
languages.original_text: You had to wait several more ship cycles for the escort squad to make its way from the uppermost decks down to the very bottom. Informed about a "high-ranking guest" in their midst, the overseers of Bay Theta 54 tried to brighten your stay with passable food, a soft bed, and even warm water, a privilege not accorded to locals. Eventually, you see the familiar faces of escort officers who have come to retrieve you.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente tuvo que esperar varios ciclos de la nave más hasta que el escuadrón de escolta llegó de las cubiertas superiores a las más profundas. Los supervisores de la bahía Theta 54, informados de la presencia de un{mf||a} «invitad{mf|o|a} de alto rango», intentaron alegrar la visita de{mf|l| la} Comerciante con comida decente, una cama agradable e incluso agua caliente, un privilegio ajeno a los residentes. Bien está lo que bien acaba: {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán vuelve a estar al mando y continúa su viaje por la Extensión de Koronus. ¡Larga vida a {name} von Valancius!

languages.text: Du musstest mehrere Schiffszyklen warten, bis die Eskorte von den obersten Decks bis ganz nach unten kam. Über einen 'hochrangigen Gast' in ihrer Mitte informiert, versuchten die Aufseher von Modul Theta 54, deinen Aufenthalt so angenehm wie möglich zu gestalten, mit passablem Essen, einem weichen Bett und sogar warmem Wasser ... einem Privileg, das den Einheimischen nicht gewährt wurde. Schließlich siehst du die vertrauten Gesichter der Geleitoffiziere, die gekommen sind, um dich zu retten.
languages.original_text: You had to wait several more ship cycles for the escort squad to make its way from the uppermost decks down to the very bottom. Informed about a "high-ranking guest" in their midst, the overseers of Bay Theta 54 tried to brighten your stay with passable food, a soft bed, and even warm water, a privilege not accorded to locals. Eventually, you see the familiar faces of escort officers who have come to retrieve you.

traits.locale_text: Du musstest mehrere Schiffszyklen warten, bis die Eskorte von den obersten Decks bis ganz nach unten kam. Über einen 'hochrangigen Gast' in ihrer Mitte informiert, versuchten die Aufseher von Modul Theta 54, deinen Aufenthalt so angenehm wie möglich zu gestalten, mit passablem Essen, einem weichen Bett und sogar warmem Wasser ... einem Privileg, das den Einheimischen nicht gewährt wurde. Schließlich siehst du die vertrauten Gesichter der Geleitoffiziere, die gekommen sind, um dich zu retten.

Mehrere Schiffszyklen lang musste {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} warten, bis die Eskorte von den obersten Decks bis ganz unten gelangte. Über einen "hochrangigen Gast" in ihrer Mitte informiert, versuchten die Aufseher von Modul Theta 54, den Aufenthalt {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} so angenehm wie möglich zu gestalten, mit passablem Essen, einem weichen Bett und sogar warmem Wasser – einem Privileg, das Einheimischen nicht gewährt wurde. Am Ende erblickt der Lord Captain doch noch die vertrauten Gesichter der Eskortoffiziere, die {mf|ihn|sie} abholen sollen.

languages.text: Vous n'avez eu d'autre choix que d'attendre plusieurs cycles du vaisseau que l'escorte venue des ponts supérieurs ne vous atteigne. Prévenus de la présence d'une personne de haut rang parmi eux, les superviseurs de la baie Thêta 54 ont essayé d'adoucir votre séjour avec de la nourriture passable, un lit moelleux et même de l'eau chaude, un privilège interdit aux locaux. Quelque temps plus tard, les officiers d'escorte ont fini par venir vous récupérer.
languages.original_text: You had to wait several more ship cycles for the escort squad to make its way from the uppermost decks down to the very bottom. Informed about a "high-ranking guest" in their midst, the overseers of Bay Theta 54 tried to brighten your stay with passable food, a soft bed, and even warm water, a privilege not accorded to locals. Eventually, you see the familiar faces of escort officers who have come to retrieve you.

traits.locale_text: Vous n'avez eu d'autre choix que d'attendre plusieurs cycles du vaisseau que l'escorte venue des ponts supérieurs ne vous atteigne. Prévenus de la présence d'une personne de haut rang parmi eux, les superviseurs de la baie Thêta 54 ont essayé d'adoucir votre séjour avec de la nourriture passable, un lit moelleux et même de l'eau chaude, un privilège interdit aux locaux. Quelque temps plus tard, les officiers d'escorte ont fini par venir vous récupérer.

languages.text: 自由開拓者は、さらに船の数サイクル、護衛部隊が最高層から最下層のデッキへと降りてくるのを待つ羽目になった。”身分の高い客人”がいることを知らされたベイ・シータ54の監督者たちは、自由開拓者の滞在を明るくもてなそうと、まずまずの食事、ふかふかのベッド、さらに現地民には許されていないお湯まで用意する。やがてあなたの元に、救出に来た護衛士官たちのお馴染みの面々が現れた。
languages.original_text: You had to wait several more ship cycles for the escort squad to make its way from the uppermost decks down to the very bottom. Informed about a "high-ranking guest" in their midst, the overseers of Bay Theta 54 tried to brighten your stay with passable food, a soft bed, and even warm water, a privilege not accorded to locals. Eventually, you see the familiar faces of escort officers who have come to retrieve you.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者は、さらに船の数サイクル、護衛部隊が最高層から最下層のデッキへと降りてくるのを待つ羽目になった。”身分の高い客人”がいることを知らされたベイ・シータ54の監督者たちは、自由開拓者の滞在を明るくもてなそうと、まずまずの食事、ふかふかのベッド、さらに現地民には許されていないお湯まで用意する。やがてロード・キャプテンの元に、救出に来た護衛士官たちのお馴染みの面々が現れた。

languages.text: Üst güvertelerden en altlara ilerleyen refakatçi mangayı beklerken birkaç gemi döngüsü daha geçiriyorsun. Aralarında "üst rütbeli bir misafir" bulunduğunu öğrenen Thita 54 Bölmesi gözetmenleri; sana daha iyi yemekler, yumuşak bir yatak ve hatta sıcak su gibi bölme halkının erişemediği ayrıcalıklarla konaklama sunuyor. Sonunda seni almaya gelen refakatçi subayların tanıdık yüzlerini görüyorsun.
languages.original_text: You had to wait several more ship cycles for the escort squad to make its way from the uppermost decks down to the very bottom. Informed about a "high-ranking guest" in their midst, the overseers of Bay Theta 54 tried to brighten your stay with passable food, a soft bed, and even warm water, a privilege not accorded to locals. Eventually, you see the familiar faces of escort officers who have come to retrieve you.
